Instance.description: Base tunable class for Pie Menu Categories

Tunable.name: _collapsible
Tunable.description: If enabled, when this category only has one item inside, that item will show on the pie menu without going through this category. If disabled, the user will always go through this category, regardless of the number of entries within.

Tunable.name: _display_priority
Tunable.description: The display priority of this category.

Tunable.name: _icon
Tunable.description: Icon to be displayed in the pie menu

TunableEnum.name: _special_category
TunableEnum.description: Designate this category as a special category. Most will be NO_CATEGORY.

Tunable.name: always_show_disabled_interactions
Tunable.description: If enabled, display all disabled interactions under this category, even if they all have the same disabled tooltip.

TunableList.name: mood_overrides
TunableList.description: If sim matches mood, tooltip and display name of category will be updated with tuned values.
